nodes.text: Gustab Wenbus was a racer who started the modern age of podracing by entering an event on the planet Malastare with a special pod designed by the mechanic Phoebos. Rather then the animal-drawn carts or Hanno Speeders used in most races at the time, Gustab's pod combined a repulsorlift pod with flaming jet engines.

Gustab Wenbus was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2015 magazine Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon 51. The character originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where Wenbus was first mentioned in the 2000 reference book Inside the Worlds of Star Wars: Episode I, which was written by Kristin Lund.
